name: Smugglerships
description:
This "game" is all about sailmans craftmanship. You are playing as a captain of a smuggler ship. Your target is to reach the target area (marked with a big spotting arrow). 

Almost all planned features were sacrified due to lack of time. I failed to hard to implement simplified boat physics, so deal with it. 

Controls:

W

Set sails (Gear up)

S

Reff sails (Gear down)

A

Turn left

D

Turn right

Q

Turn sails clockwise

E

Turn sails counter clockwise

MMB Wheel

Zoom in/out

MMB Press + Rotate

Rotate camera

Credits/Contributors:

Design/Programming/Assets: Thomas Eichler (necro1895)

Sounds: https://freesound.org/

Watershader: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uuzB93F39P8

I made all models with blender and textured them by substance painter / designer
